name: An unusual dice's QUEST
description: An unusual dice's QUEST (or AUDQ for friends) is a very, very small game that I had the pleasure of developing for GMTK Game Jam 2022 as my first moderately serious title. I have to mention that I have been in charge of creating all the assets of the game using free tools such as Paint 3D and soundtrap, except for the fonts used in the game sprites. This title is, like the vast majority of my projects, open source, so it is also published on GitHub. I hope you enjoy it and if so, please leave a positive review and share it, it would help me a lot. Also, I have a small YouTube channel in Spanish that you can watch if you've been wanting more.
